casebody.data:
PRUETT
v.
BINGHAM, et al. No. 34A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 14, 2015. H. Lee Davis, Jr., Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Bingham, Joel D., et al. W.O. Brazil, III, Asheville, Attorney at Law, for Mountain Home Fire & Rescue Department, Inc., et al. Meghann K. Burke, Asheville, Attorney at Law, for Mountain Home Fire & Rescue Department, Inc., et al. Katherine Marie Barber-Jones, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Bingham, Joel D., et al. Michael E. Casterline, Asheville, Attorney at Law, for Brackett, Matthew. Ann C. Rowe, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Bingham, Joel D., et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of September 2015 by Defendant and Third-Party Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of September 2015."

Defendant and Third-Party Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 26th day of October 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
